subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Luis Castillo, who has a strained hip flexor, may come off the disabled list on Thursday. But in his absence, Damion Easley and Argenis Reyes held down the fort.
snippet: Luis Castillo, who has a strained hip flexor, may come off the disabled list on Thursday. But in his absence, Damion Easley and Argenis Reyes held down the fort.
